findBaseClassViaMappings

public <T> CFMappingDef<? super T> findBaseClassViaMappings(CFMappingDef<T> cfMapDef)
Examine class hierarchy using CFMappingDef objects to discover the given class' "base inheritance" class. A base inheritance class is determined by CFMappingDef.isBaseEntity()

Type Parameters:
T -
Parameters:
cfMapDef -
Returns:
returns the base in the ColumnFamily mapping hierarchy

initializeCacheForClass

public <T> CFMappingDef<T> initializeCacheForClass(Class<T> clazz)
